item.title: 星展银行因违反反洗钱规定被香港罚款
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司因在遵守反洗钱和反恐融资法规方面存在过失，被香港监管机构罚款 1,000 万港元（128 万美元）。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. was fined HK$10 million ($1.28 million) by Hong Kong’s regulator for lapses in adhering to anti-money laundering and counter-terrorist financing regulations.】

item.title: 投资者称工党获胜后英国资产重获青睐
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默领导的工党在大选中取得压倒性胜利，燃起了人们对政治平静期和稳健的国家财政政策的希望，英国资产重新受到青睐。【原文：UK assets are back in favor after Keir Starmer’s Labour party swept to a landslide election win, fueling hopes for a period of political calm and a steady approach to the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 尼日尔撤销铀矿开采许可后加拿大铀矿公司股价暴跌
item.description: GoviEx Uranium Inc. 是一家在尼日尔开采铀矿的加拿大公司，在报道了西非国家军方领导人撤销其开采许可后，该公司股价暴跌。【原文：GoviEx Uranium Inc., a Canadian company that mines in Niger, plunged after reporting that the West African nation’s military leaders withdrew its permit.】

item.title: 埃赫曼与华友探讨在印尼建立电动车镍矿合作关系
item.description: 法国矿业公司 Eramet SA 正在探索与浙江华友钴业股份有限公司合作，在印尼生产电池级镍矿。【原文：French miner Eramet SA is exploring a partnership with Zhejiang Huayou Cobalt Co. to produce battery-grade nickel in Indonesia after a similar project with a European partner fell through last month.】

item.title: 欧洲银行面临压力测试能力调查
item.description: 全球金融危机爆发后，压力测试成为银行政策的标志，而欧洲银行正面临调查，以了解它们在执行压力测试方面的能力如何。【原文：European banks are facing investigations into how good they are at carrying out the stress tests that became a hallmark of banking policy in the aftermath of the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气的低波动性预示着交易商将避免下大赌注
item.description: 今年以来，欧洲天然气期权的波动率有所下降，这表明交易商在最近的天然气供应中断事件凸显出该地区天然气供应的脆弱性之后，正在避免下大赌注。【原文：Volatility in European natural gas options has fallen this year, signaling that traders are steering clear of big bets after recent disruptions highlighted the fragility of the region’s supplies.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦股票评级下调可能意味着 "被动持股的终结
item.description: Intermarket Securities Ltd.称，在富时罗素（FTSE Russell）将巴基斯坦降级为前沿市场后，外国基金可能会抛售 4000 万至 1.5 亿美元的巴基斯坦股票。【原文：Foreign funds may sell $40 million to $150 million of Pakistani stocks after the country was downgraded by FTSE Russell to frontier-market status, according to Intermarket Securities Ltd.】

item.title: 斯坦森-迪恩谈木材价格暴跌的更多内容
item.description:
木材为何已经衰退？【原文：

Why wood is already in recession.

】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团支持的 L Catterton 公司考虑出售沙特阿拉伯 Bateel 公司的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由法国奢侈时尚品牌路威酩轩集团（LVMH）支持的私募股权公司 L Catterton 正寻求出售其在沙特阿拉伯美食生产商和连锁餐厅 Bateel 的股份。【原文：L Catterton, the private equity firm backed by luxury French fashion house LVMH, is looking to sell its stake in Saudi Arabian gourmet food producer and restaurant chain Bateel, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼称关税审查可能涵盖更多商品和国家
item.description: 印度尼西亚贸易部将对更广泛的商品进行调查，以规范威胁当地产业的进口激增。【原文：Indonesia’s Trade Ministry will investigate a broader range of goods as it seeks to regulate the surge in imports that threatens local industries.】

item.title: 勒庞驳斥民调显示极右翼未占法国多数的说法
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞驳斥了一些预测，这些预测显示她的极右翼政党国民集会党将在法国立法选举中远远达不到绝对多数，并警告说如果她不能获得执政授权，将陷入 "泥潭"。【原文：Marine Le Pen dismissed projections that show her far-right National Rally party is set to fall well short of an absolute majority in the French legislative election and warned of a “quagmire” if she doesn’t get a mandate to govern.】

item.title: 壳牌、道达尔和其他公司据称将参股阿德诺克液化天然气厂
item.description: 据知情人士透露，四家国际公司已同意投资阿布扎比国家石油公司的下一个液化天然气出口项目。【原文：Four international companies have agreed to invest in Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s next liquefied natural gas export project, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行寻求购买 13 亿美元 Corniche 贷款的一部分
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已经与几家现有贷款机构进行了接触，希望购买其在香港一个豪华地产开发项目的 102 亿港元（13 亿美元）项目贷款中的股份。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has approached several existing lenders to buy a stake in a HK$10.2 billion ($1.3 billion) project loan backing a luxury-property development in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 土耳其债券流入量增加，当地银行在国外购买债券
item.description: 土耳其银行找到了一种迂回的方式来获取国外更便宜的里拉流动性，并以此夸大国外购买里拉计价政府债券的数字。【原文：Turkish banks have found a roundabout way to access cheaper lira liquidity abroad, and in doing so are inflating figures for foreign purchases of lira-denominated government bonds.】

item.title: 工党赢得大选，英国国内股市创今年最大涨幅
item.description: 由于工党在大选中取得压倒性胜利，激发了人们对政治稳定可能支持经济增长反弹的希望，与英国国内经济相关的股票创下了今年以来的最佳涨幅。更广泛的欧洲市场也有所上涨。【原文：Shares exposed to the British domestic economy saw their best gains of the year, as the Labour Party’s landslide election victory spurred hopes that political stability could support a potential rebound in economic growth. The broader European market also gained.】

item.title: StanChart 认为印度央行有下调利率的空间，从而推动债券资金流入
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）称，印度央行还有降息空间，这可能有助于增加流入该国债券市场的资金。【原文：India’s central bank has room to lower interest rates, which may help intensify inflows into the nation’s bond market, according to Standard Chartered Plc.】

item.title: 据说 HDFC 银行将在增长审查中酝酿出售贷款组合
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着信贷增长速度的加快，监管机构对国内贷款机构的审查也在加强，而 HDFC Bank Ltd. 正在酝酿出售一个贷款组合。【原文：HDFC Bank Ltd. is mulling the sale of a loans portfolio, according to people familiar with the matter, amid heightened regulatory scrutiny on the nation’s lenders as their credit growth surges.】

item.title: 壳牌天然气交易疲软，下游资产减记
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）表示，预计第二季度天然气贸易收益将下降，并预计下游资产减值多达 20 亿美元，其中包括其在新加坡的化工厂和在荷兰推迟建设的生物燃料厂。【原文：Shell Plc said it expected lower gas trading earnings in the second quarter and anticipated as much as $2 billion of impairments on downstream assets, including its chemicals facility in Singapore and a delayed biofuels plant under construction in the Netherlands.】

item.title: 德国工业产值意外下滑，经济反弹举步维艰
item.description: 德国 5 月份的工业生产出乎意料地大幅下滑，这是欧洲最大经济体的复苏可能出现动摇的最新迹象。【原文：German industrial production unexpectedly plunged in May — the latest sign that the recovery in Europe’s biggest economy may be faltering.】

item.title: 勒庞的电力市场 "自由脱欧 "计划令法国邻国担忧
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞的能源计划有可能给欧洲电力市场的运作带来混乱。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s energy plans risk throwing a spanner into the workings of Europe’s electricity market.】

item.title: Insignia Financial 将向全球私人信贷投资数十亿美元
item.description: Insignia Financial Ltd. 的养老金业务正处于任命外部经理人的最后阶段，以将数十亿美元部署到全球私人信贷市场。【原文：Insignia Financial Ltd.’s pensions business is in the final stages of appointing external managers to deploy billions of dollars into global private credit markets.】

item.title: Segantii 校友的新对冲基金获香港监管机构批准
item.description: 一家由前 Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 投资组合经理领导的新对冲基金公司周四表示，该公司原则上获得了香港证券监察机构的批准，扫清了一个重要的监管障碍。【原文：A new hedge fund firm led by a former Segantii Capital Management Ltd. portfolio manager said it won approval in principle from Hong Kong’s securities watchdog on Thursday, clearing a major regulatory hurdle.】

item.title: 安曼矿业公司为矿山扩建寻求高达 15 亿美元的贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼矿业公司 PT Amman Mineral Internasional 正在寻求高达 15 亿美元的贷款，以扩建该国第二大铜金矿。【原文：Indonesian miner PT Amman Mineral Internasional is seeking up to $1.5 billion in a loan to expand the country’s second largest copper and gold mine, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃拉比称勒庞预计将在法国大选中赢得 200-230 个席位
item.description: 根据民调公司 Elabe 为 BFM 电视台和《论坛报》（La Tribune Dimanche）提供的预测，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的国民阵线将在周日举行的法国立法选举中远远无法获得绝对多数。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s National Rally is set to fall well short of an absolute majority in the French legislative election on Sunday, according to projections from polling company Elabe for BFM TV and La Tribune Dimanche.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 股市低迷，中国 "国家队 "在ETF中表现活跃
item.description: 在中国股市跌破关键心理价位后，一些受到中国主权财富基金青睐的交易所交易基金出现了大量资金流入。【原文：Some exchange traded funds favored by China’s sovereign wealth fund have seen a flurry of spikes in inflows after the country’s stocks tumbled below a key psychological level.】

item.title: 投资者押注法国大选后资产将面临数月波动
item.description: 无论哪个政党在周日的法国议会选举中胜出，一些投资者都认为这次投票标志着法国股票和债券市场将进入一个更加动荡的时期。【原文：No matter which party comes out on top in Sunday’s French parliamentary election, some investors are betting the vote marks the beginning of a more turbulent period for the country’s stock and bond markets.】

item.title: 英国金融家聘请拉扎德为夭折的赞比亚交易提供顾问服务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，英国国际投资公司（British International Investment Plc）已聘请拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：British International Investment Plc, has hired Lazard Inc. to advise it on the way forward for a convertible preference share investment in a Zambian meat producer, according to people with knowledge of the matter, after the firm lost more than a third of its value.】

item.title: 瑞典房价有望从 2022 年的低迷中复苏
item.description: 通胀冲击使借贷成本上升，导致住房建设几近停滞，瑞典的住房价格已经收复了第一年所遭受损失的近一半。【原文：Swedish housing prices have recouped close to half of the losses they sustained in the first year of an inflation shock that sent borrowing costs higher and led to a near-standstill in homebuilding.】

item.title: 需求担忧持续，铁矿石从一个月高点回落
item.description: 铁矿石从一个月高点回落，因为投资者在权衡中国需求的复苏是否可持续。【原文：Iron ore retreated from a one-month high as investors weighed whether a recovery in Chinese demand will be sustainable.】
